sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnqustnrrespondinfo ( qustnr_tmplat_id , qestnr_id , qustnr_respond_id , sexdstn_code , occp_ty_code , respond_nm , brthdy , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #qustnrTmplatId# , #qestnrId# , #qustnrRespondId# , #sexdstnCode# , #occpTyCode# , #respondNm# , #brthdy# , #areaNo# , #middleTelno# , #endTelno# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnqustnrrespondinfo SET qustnr_tmplat_id = #qustnrTmplatId# , qestnr_id = #qestnrId# , qustnr_respond_id = #qustnrRespondId# , sexdstn_code = #sexdstnCode# , occp_ty_code = #occpTyCode# , respond_nm = #respondNm# , brthdy = #brthdy# , area_no = #areaNo# , middle_telno = #middleTelno# , end_telno = #endTelno# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND qustnr_tmplat_id = #qustnrTmplatId# AND qestnr_id = #qestnrId# AND qustnr_respond_id = #qustnrRespondId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnqustnrrespondinfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND qustnr_tmplat_id = #qustnrTmplatId# AND qestnr_id = #qestnrId# AND qustnr_respond_id = #qustnrRespondId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT qustnr_tmplat_id , qestnr_id , qustnr_respond_id , sexdstn_code , occp_ty_code , respond_nm , brthdy , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM COMTNQUSTNRRESPONDINFO WHERE qustnr_tmplat_id = #qustnrTmplatId# AND qestnr_id = #qestnrId# AND qustnr_respond_id = #qustnrRespondId#

SELECT A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID , A.QESTNR_ID , A.QUSTNR_RESPOND_ID , A.SEXDSTN_CODE , A.OCCP_TY_CODE , A.RESPOND_NM , A.BRTHDY , A.AREA_NO , A.MIDDLE_TELNO , A.END_TELNO , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID , QESTNR_ID , QUSTNR_RESPOND_ID , SEXDSTN_CODE , OCCP_TY_CODE , RESPOND_NM , BRTHDY , AREA_NO , MIDDLE_TELNO , END_TELNO , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTNQUSTNRRESPONDINFO WHERE 1=1
QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #searchKeyword#
QESTNR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID DESC , QESTNR_ID DESC , QUSTNR_RESPOND_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNQUSTNRRESPONDINFO WHERE 1=1
QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #searchKeyword#
QESTNR_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
